name: Twisty Tunnels (AndyMakes)
description:
Created as a demo for the Indie Maker Syndicate Jam Jam Revolution.

This is the keyboard version of the game. You can find the version meant to be played on the twisty controller here.

Controls

Make sure to click the game area before you begin playing.

Arrows - move

X - Jump

Z - Pause

M to mute

Credits

Game by Andy Wallace 

Audio by Jay Ackley

NA16 Palette by Nauris

Fonts by Chevy Ray

Controller Photo by Matt Lepage

Source
